salesforce_username.description: Username of the salesforce account to load the data from. salesforce_username, salesforce_password, salesforce_token can be replaced by salesforce_oauth_refresh_token

salesforce_password.description: Password of the salesforce account to load the data from. salesforce_username, salesforce_password, salesforce_token can be replaced by salesforce_oauth_refresh_token

salesforce_token.description: Security token for API access of the salesforce account to load the data from. salesforce_username, salesforce_password, salesforce_token can be replaced by salesforce_oauth_refresh_token

salesforce_oauth_refresh_token.description: OAuth refresh token for the account from which the data should be downloaded. Can be replaced by salesforce_username, salesforce_password, salesforce_token.

salesforce_client_id.description: Id of the Salesforce app to use. One app can be used for multiple accounts.

salesforce_client_secret.description: Secret of the Salesforce app to use. One app can be used for multiple accounts.

salesforce_objects.description: List of salesforce objects to be downloaded. All available fields are downloaded.

salesforce_created_from.description: If passed, only objects created from the date are downloaded from salesforce.

salesforce_created_to.description: If passed, only objects created until the date are downloaded from salesforce.

salesforce_single_batch.description: If value passed the Salesforce data are downloaded in a single batch as opposed to multiple parallel batches. Might be significanlty faster for small data and not working for big data.

dss_historized_objects.description: Subset of salesforce_objects. For these objects a special table with snapshot date column is created. The table isn't populated automatically, user needs to do this in sql in subsequent bricks.

dss_jdbc_url.description: Url of the DSS instance to work with.

dss_GDC_USERNAME.description: Username that is used for authenticating to DSS. If not passed, GDC_USERNAME is used.

dss_GDC_PASSWORD.description: Password that is used for authenticating to DSS. If not passed, GDC_PASSWORD is used.
